duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide scheduled transportation services for seniors and ensure that company vehicles operate in an optimal condition.
Ensure the safety of all passengers and assist them as they enter and exit the vehicle as necessary.
Complete a comprehensive daily written inspection of the company vehicle and report any conditions of concern to the Property Manager.
Ensure the completion of routine maintenance of the vehicle and keep it clean and free of debris.
Operate a commercial motor vehicle in accordance with all local, state, federal, and Department of Transportation regulations.
Have current knowledge of highway safety rules and regulations and pass drug, background, and driving record screenings.

skills.skill: Valid Class B CDL Driver’s license with passenger endorsement
Good driving record and current auto insurance
Current Medical Examiner’s Certificate (MEC), Form MCSA-5876
Ability to safely operate a commercial motor vehicle
Knowledge of highway safety rules and regulations
